name: Ceylon Cinnamon Sticks (Quills)
description: Premium hand-rolled quills. 100% organic and export certified.
longDescription: Ceylon Cinnamon sticks are hand-rolled from the finest Cinnamomum verum bark. Perfect for cooking, teas, and baking. Known for their delicate aroma, antioxidant properties, and low coumarin content.
benefits: Helps maintain healthy blood sugar levels
Rich in antioxidants that fight inflammation

name: Cinnamon Powder
description: Ultra-fine powder. Farm fresh and aromatic.
longDescription: Ceylon Cinnamon powder is perfect for spicing up your dishes and drinks. Organic and farm fresh, it has a fine texture and long-lasting aroma.

name: Cinnamon Oil
description: Pure essential oil for aroma, cooking, and wellness.
longDescription: Our premium Ceylon Cinnamon oil is extracted from the bark and leaves of the Cinnamomum verum tree. It’s perfect for aromatherapy, massage, and culinary purposes.

name: Cinnamon Toothpaste
description: Natural cinnamon toothpaste for fresh breath and healthy gums.
longDescription: Our cinnamon toothpaste uses natural ingredients to ensure fresh breath and healthy gums. Free from harmful chemicals and enriched with Ceylon cinnamon for oral care.

name: Cinnamon Perfume
description: Exquisite cinnamon-infused perfume with long-lasting aroma.
longDescription: Experience a luxurious and warm fragrance with our cinnamon perfume. Long-lasting and exotic, perfect for daily wear or special occasions.

name: Cinnamon Tea
description: Aromatic cinnamon tea for a warm and soothing experience.
longDescription: Brew a calming cup of cinnamon tea. It’s aromatic, naturally sweet, and helps you relax after a long day. Ideal for morning or evening tea rituals.

name: Cinnamon Soap
description: Handmade cinnamon soap with antibacterial and aromatic properties.
longDescription: Our handmade cinnamon soap is gentle on skin and enriched with natural cinnamon. Perfect for daily use with aromatic benefits and antibacterial protection.

name: Cinnamon Honey Spread
description: Organic honey infused with premium Ceylon cinnamon.
longDescription: Enjoy the sweetness of organic honey with a touch of premium Ceylon cinnamon. Perfect on toast, desserts, or in beverages.
